title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 469.3 - Qualifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 469.3 - Qualifications

State Regulations

To be eligible for consideration for temporary reappointment, retired members must be fit for full and strenuous duty, and have retired
within three years of the date of reappointment. An eligible retired member
must pass a physical examination, background investigation, and meet any other
standards established by the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
469.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
